entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:30 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 01:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
